about_the_game:
Fist of Yokai is a roguelite dungeon crawler with an innovative hack and slash mechanic that will get you hooked. Inspired by modern Roguelites (Binding of Isaac, Hades, Neon Abyss, etc.) and frenetic Hack and Slash games (Devil May Cry, Bayonetta, etc.) adding our own personal twist. Hard to master mechanics, incredibly rewarding feeling.

SAVE SHINCHOKU

Summoned by the CEO of Shinchoku’s most wealthy company, you’ll strap on your gauntlets and smash the invader yokai, exploring and cleaning the never repeating metropolis and saving their citizens.

KILL THEIR LEADERS

Use the power of your friendly Hitodama to face yokai leaders like Raiju, the thunder itself, in an epic, chaotic battle. Discover the reasons behind the invasion.

BOOST UP

Recover your strength in Kitsune's room and alter your fighting style by transitioning between a variety of abilities. Strive to improve continuously, transforming once-impossible challenges into effortless feats.

Features

  • RogueSlash: Replayability of a rogue-lite with the intensity of Hack and Slash games.

  • Over 120 rooms (and going up), tweaked by our best level designers.

  • Anime style art and VFXs.

  • Innovative mechanics.

  • Awesome soundtrack.

short_description: Throw down in a world where steam meets the supernatural, as you hack and slash your way through a maze filled with yokai horrors. Upgrade yourself and slash through yokai leaders to save the steampunk metropolis in this exciting roguelite dungeon crawler. An indie game by 2 friends.
